results.name: default/wordpress-6bbbfd677-djxz8

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: HTTP probe failed with statuscode: 500

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the application returned a 500 status code, indicating an internal server error.

Solution: 
1. Check application logs for errors.
2. Ensure all dependencies are running.
3. Verify configuration settings.
4. Restart the application.

results.name: default/wordpress

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-6bbbfd677-djxz8], expected 1

results.details:
Error: The service has no ready endpoints because the pod "wordpress-6bbbfd677-djxz8" is not ready, but 1 is expected.

Solution: 
1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`.
2. Inspect pod details using `kubectl describe pod wordpress-6bbbfd677-djxz8`.
3. Look for readiness probe issues.
4. Resolve any errors and ensure the pod is running and ready.
